snippet: The Big East announced an agreement to sell its name to the seven Catholic universities that are breaking away this summer to form a basketball-only conference.
abstract: Big East announces agreement to sell its name to seven Catholic universities that are breaking away this summer to form a basketball-only conference.
lead_paragraph: The Big East announced an agreement to sell its name to the seven Catholic universities that are breaking away this summer to form a basketball-only conference.

headline.seo: Big East to Sell Its Name to Breakaway Catholic Universities
headline.main: Big East Agrees to Sell Name to Breakaway Group of 7
headline.print_headline: Big East Agrees to Sell Name To Breakaway Group of 7
